20110103100029.000|20110103100030.000|CC1|>> AS CHINA HAS BECOME A        
20110103100030.000|20110103100032.000|CC1|POLITICAL FORCE IN THE WORLD, IT
20110103100032.000|20110103100036.000|CC1|HAS BECOME POLITICALLY          
20110103100036.000|20110103100037.000|CC1|COMPETENT.                      
20110103100037.000|20110103100039.000|CC1|BUT THE CONFIDENCE SHOULD       
20110103100039.000|20110103100040.000|CC1|SATURDAY START FROM BOTTOM UP.  
20110103100040.000|20110103100042.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY THE CHINESE          
20110103100042.000|20110103100044.000|CC1|LEADERSHIP STARTED TO GET       
20110103100044.000|20110103100047.000|CC1|ONLINE, TO LISTEN, TO TALK, TO  
20110103100047.000|20110103100051.000|CC1|HEAR THE PULSE OF THE NATION.   
20110103100051.000|20110103100053.000|CC1|>> CHINESE PEOPLE HAVE A LOT ON 
20110103100053.000|20110103100058.000|CC1|THEIR MINDS -- HOUSING,         
20110103100058.000|20110103100100.000|CC1|INFLATION, EMPLOYMENT, HEALTH   
20110103100100.000|20110103100102.000|CC1|CARE, FOOD SAFETY, AND MUCH     
20110103100102.000|20110103100104.000|CC1|MORE.                           
20110103100104.000|20110103100107.000|CC1|THESE ISSUES ALSO CONCERN THE   
20110103100107.000|20110103100108.000|CC1|COUNTRY'S TOP LEADERS.          
20110103100108.000|20110103100111.000|CC1|AND BEFORE THE PEOPLE'S CONGRESS
20110103100111.000|20110103100114.000|CC1|MET IN MARCH, THE PREMIERE WENT 
20110103100114.000|20110103100116.000|CC1|ONLINE TO HEAR WHAT THE PEOPLE  
20110103100116.000|20110103100120.000|CC1|THINK.                          
20110103100120.000|20110103100123.000|CC1|>> I MAY NOT ANSWER THE SQUEZZ  
20110103100123.000|20110103100124.000|CC1|COMPLETELY NOR SOLVE THE        
20110103100124.000|20110103100125.000|CC1|PROBLEMS OF EVERYBODY, BUT IT   
20110103100125.000|20110103100127.000|CC1|GIVES ME A CHANCE TO GET HELP   
20110103100127.000|20110103100128.000|CC1|FROM THE PEOPLE.                
20110103100128.000|20110103100131.000|CC1|>> THE WEBSITE OF CHINA'S       
20110103100131.000|20110103100134.000|CC1|LARGEST NEWS AGENCY SET UP THE  
20110103100134.000|20110103100140.000|CC1|CHAT IN THIS ROOM.              
20110103100140.000|20110103100143.000|CC1|>> THE PREMIERE STARTED BY      
20110103100143.000|20110103100144.000|CC1|TELLING CHATTERS THAT HE BROUGHT
20110103100144.000|20110103100148.000|CC1|WITH HIM A WHOLE HEART.         
20110103100148.000|20110103100150.000|CC1|HE DIDN'T EVEN BRING WITH HIM A 
20110103100150.000|20110103100151.000|CC1|PIECE OF PAPER.                 
20110103100151.000|20110103100152.000|CC1|THE ANSWERS WERE ALL IN HIS     
20110103100152.000|20110103100155.000|CC1|MIND.                           
20110103100155.000|20110103100159.000|CC1|>> IN A LITTLE OVER TWO HOURS,  
20110103100159.000|20110103100203.000|CC1|INTERNET USES -- USERS SUBMITTED
20110103100203.000|20110103100204.000|CC1|400,000 QUESTIONS.              
20110103100204.000|20110103100207.000|CC1|SUBMISSIONS WERE ALSO MADE BY   
20110103100207.000|20110103100211.000|CC1|FEX MESSAGE -- TEXT MESSAGE.    
20110103100211.000|20110103100214.000|CC1|THERE WERE 13 MILLION HITS.     
20110103100214.000|20110103100216.000|CC1|NEARLY A THIRD OF CHINA'S       
20110103100216.000|20110103100218.000|CC1|POPULATION USES THE INTERNET,   
20110103100218.000|20110103100221.000|CC1|MAKING IT THE LARGEST ONLINE    
20110103100221.000|20110103100221.000|CC1|COMMUNITY IN THE WORLD.         
20110103100221.000|20110103100224.000|CC1|MANY OF THEM GO ONLINE TO VOICE 
20110103100224.000|20110103100225.000|CC1|THEIR VIEWS.                    
20110103100225.000|20110103100228.000|CC1|>> WHEN THE CENTRAL OR LOCAL    
20110103100228.000|20110103100229.000|CC1|GOVERNMENTS CIRCULATED, THEY ARE
20110103100229.000|20110103100231.000|CC1|MORE AND MORE WILLING TO LISTEN 
20110103100231.000|20110103100234.000|CC1|TO WHAT RESIDENTS HAVE TO SAY.  
20110103100234.000|20110103100237.000|CC1|FOR MANY DRAFT BILLS, THE       
20110103100237.000|20110103100239.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT SOLICITS PUBLIC      
20110103100239.000|20110103100240.000|CC1|OPINION FIRST.                  
20110103100240.000|20110103100241.000|CC1|THEY ANALYZE THESE SUGGESTIONS  
20110103100241.000|20110103100243.000|CC1|TO MAKE CHANGES TO THE DRAFT.   
20110103100243.000|20110103100244.000|CC1|THERE HAVE BEEN MANY SUCH       
20110103100244.000|20110103100247.000|CC1|EXAMPLES.                       
20110103100247.000|20110103100249.000|CC1|>> HE SAYS THE PREMIERE'S ONLINE
20110103100249.000|20110103100252.000|CC1|EXCHANGE IS SEEN BY MANY AS AN  
20110103100252.000|20110103100254.000|CC1|EXAMPLE TO LOWER-LEVEL          
20110103100254.000|20110103100254.000|CC1|OFFICIALS.                      
20110103100254.000|20110103100259.000|CC1|ABOUT A QUARTER OFFICIALS SURF  
20110103100259.000|20110103100302.000|CC1|ONLINE, AND ABOUT HALF USE THE  
20110103100302.000|20110103100304.000|CC1|INTERNET OCCASIONLY.            
20110103100304.000|20110103100305.000|CC1|>> ONLINE COMMUNICATIONS BETWEEN
20110103100305.000|20110103100306.000|CC1|THE GOVERNMENT AND INTERNET     
20110103100306.000|20110103100309.000|CC1|USERS IS PROVIDING A SCREENT    
20110103100309.000|20110103100310.000|CC1|CHANNEL FOR DECISION MAKERS TO  
20110103100310.000|20110103100312.000|CC1|HEAR PEOPLE'S VOICES.           
20110103100312.000|20110103100313.000|CC1|ON THE OTHER HAND, IT SHOWS     
20110103100313.000|20110103100315.000|CC1|PEOPLE'S GROWING SENSE OF       
20110103100315.000|20110103100317.000|CC1|PARTICIPATION IN NATIONAL AND   
20110103100317.000|20110103100318.000|CC1|REGIONAL DEVELOPMENTS.          
20110103100318.000|20110103100320.000|CC1|THE DECISION-MAKERS CAN         
20110103100320.000|20110103100322.000|CC1|THEREFORE USE PEOPLE'S WILL TO  
20110103100322.000|20110103100324.000|CC1|FORMULATE POLICIES IN A MORE    
20110103100324.000|20110103100326.000|CC1|SCIENTIFIC WAY TO REDUCE COST   
20110103100326.000|20110103100333.000|CC1|AND INCREASE EEFFICIENCY.       
20110103100333.000|20110103100342.000|CC1|>> OVER THE YEARS, THEY HAVE    
20110103100342.000|20110103100350.000|CC1|ORGANIZED MANY ONLINE CHATS.    
20110103100350.000|20110103100353.000|CC1|THE PREMIERE PROMISED TO COME   
20110103100353.000|20110103100354.000|CC1|BACK THIS YEAR.                 
20110103100354.000|20110103100400.000|CC1|HE JOKED, WE LINK OUR PINKIES TO
20110103100400.000|20110103100401.000|CC1|COMPLETE A DEAL.                
20110103100401.000|20110103100403.000|CC1|THAT MEANS THE DIALOGUE IS FAR  
20110103100403.000|20110103100404.000|CC1|FROM OVER.                      
20110103100404.000|20110103100406.000|CC1|>> MORE AND MORE CHINESE        
20110103100406.000|20110103100408.000|CC1|OFFICIALS ARE USING THE INTERNET
20110103100408.000|20110103100410.000|CC1|TO EXPLAIN POLICIES TO AN       
20110103100410.000|20110103100411.000|CC1|INCREASINGLY VOCAL AND BROADER  
20110103100411.000|20110103100412.000|CC1|PUBLIC.                         
20110103100412.000|20110103100413.000|CC1|IT IS PART OF EFFORTS BY THE    
20110103100413.000|20110103100415.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT TO BE MORE RESPONSIVE
20110103100415.000|20110103100417.000|CC1|AND ACCESSIBLE.                 
20110103100417.000|20110103100419.000|CC1|THIS GREATER TRANSPARANCY MEANS 
20110103100419.000|20110103100421.000|CC1|THEIR INCLUSIVENESS OF PEOPLE'S 
20110103100421.000|20110103100426.000|CC1|VOICES.                         
20110103100426.000|20110103100429.000|CC1|CCTV, BEIJING.                  
20110103100429.000|20110103100432.000|CC1|>> AND JOINING US FOR THIS      
20110103100432.000|20110103100436.000|CC1|PROGRAM IS VICE CHAIRMAN OF     
20110103100436.000|20110103100443.000|CC1|CHINESE STRATEGY, MR. WI JING   
20110103100443.000|20110103100445.000|CC1|WU.                             
20110103100445.000|20110103100448.000|CC1|MANY CHINESE LEADERS SAY THEY   
20110103100448.000|20110103100450.000|CC1|GET ONLINE TO LISTEN TO THE     
20110103100450.000|20110103100451.000|CC1|PUBLIC.                         
20110103100451.000|20110103100452.000|CC1|HOW MUCH DO YOU THINK IT        
20110103100452.000|20110103100454.000|CC1|AFFECTED THEIR DECISION-MAKING? 
20110103100454.000|20110103100457.000|CC1|>> I THINK IT AFFECTS A LOT THE 
20110103100457.000|20110103100458.000|CC1|WAY THE CHINESE GOVERNMENT      
20110103100458.000|20110103100500.000|CC1|GOVERNS THE CHINESE PEOPLE.     
20110103100500.000|20110103100502.000|CC1|YOU KNOW, INTERNET IS CHANGING  
20110103100502.000|20110103100505.000|CC1|THE WORLD NOT ONLY IN THE WAY OF
20110103100505.000|20110103100507.000|CC1|THE GOVERNMENT, BUT THE WAY     
20110103100507.000|20110103100510.000|CC1|PEOPLE GET INFORMATION.         
20110103100510.000|20110103100511.000|CC1|PEOPLE COMMUNICATE WITH ONE     
20110103100511.000|20110103100514.000|CC1|ANOTHER.                        
20110103100514.000|20110103100515.000|CC1|SO CERTAINLY THE WAY THE CHINESE
20110103100515.000|20110103100517.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT IS GETTING           
20110103100517.000|20110103100519.000|CC1|INFORMATION FROM THE PEOPLE IS  
20110103100519.000|20110103100521.000|CC1|MUCH MORE DIRECT.               
20110103100521.000|20110103100527.000|CC1|I THINK IN TWO WAYS -- FROM     
20110103100527.000|20110103100528.000|CC1|PEOPLE, THE GOVERNMENT IS ABLE  
20110103100528.000|20110103100530.000|CC1|TO GET THE INFORMATION MUCH MORE
20110103100530.000|20110103100531.000|CC1|EASILY.                         
20110103100531.000|20110103100533.000|CC1|ON THE OTHER SIDE, THE PEOPLE   
20110103100533.000|20110103100536.000|CC1|ALSO IS GETTING INFORMATION FROM
20110103100536.000|20110103100539.000|CC1|GOVERNMENTS MUCH MORE EASILY.   
20110103100539.000|20110103100540.000|CC1|CERTAINLY IT IS CHANGING THE    
20110103100540.000|20110103100541.000|CC1|WAYS OF THE GOVERNMENT.         
20110103100541.000|20110103100543.000|CC1|>> MANY ARE WONDERING WHICH     
20110103100543.000|20110103100545.000|CC1|PATHS CHINA WILL PURSUE IN THE  
20110103100545.000|20110103100546.000|CC1|COMING DECADES.                 
20110103100546.000|20110103100550.000|CC1|WILL WE BE ECONOMICALLY BETTER  
20110103100550.000|20110103100552.000|CC1|OFF OR WILL WE HAVE REFORM?     
20110103100552.000|20110103100554.000|CC1|WHAT ARE YOUR THOUGHTS?         
20110103100554.000|20110103100556.000|CC1|>> TWO THINGS ARE VERY          
20110103100556.000|20110103100556.000|CC1|IMPORTANT.                      
20110103100556.000|20110103100558.000|CC1|FIRST, THE RULE OF LAW.         
20110103100558.000|20110103100601.000|CC1|CHINA HAS A LONG HISTORY OF A   
20110103100601.000|20110103100603.000|CC1|FUTILE REGIME, MORE THAN 2,000  
20110103100603.000|20110103100606.000|CC1|YEARS.                          
20110103100606.000|20110103100608.000|CC1|FUTILE REGIME MEANS THE RULE OF 
20110103100608.000|20110103100611.000|CC1|MEN, NOT THE RULE OF LAW.       
20110103100611.000|20110103100615.000|CC1|WE ADOPT SO MANY LAWS -- SO MANY
20110103100615.000|20110103100616.000|CC1|, I MEAN, REGULATIONS.          
20110103100616.000|20110103100618.000|CC1|SO WE WANT THE RULE OF LAW.     
20110103100618.000|20110103100620.000|CC1|THAT MEANS DEMOCRACY.           
20110103100620.000|20110103100623.000|CC1|DEMOCRACY IS CHINA'S GOAL.      
20110103100623.000|20110103100626.000|CC1|THEY LIKE TO MAKE CHINA         
20110103100626.000|20110103100633.000|CC1|PROSPEROUS P. CIVILIZED.        
20110103100633.000|20110103100637.000|CC1|A HARMONIOUS SOCIETY.           
20110103100637.000|20110103100644.000|CC1|ABOVE ALL WE NEED CHANGES IN THE
20110103100644.000|20110103100644.000|CC1|PARTY.                          
20110103100644.000|20110103100646.000|CC1|IN THAT WAY, THEY WILL MAKE     
20110103100646.000|20110103100647.000|CC1|HEADWAY.                        
20110103100647.000|20110103100649.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU.                   
20110103100649.000|20110103100743.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU.                   
20110103100743.000|20110103100745.000|CC1|>> THIS IS WHERE 150 MEN WERE   
20110103100745.000|20110103100746.000|CC1|DUG OUT ALIVE IN MARCH.         
20110103100746.000|20110103100750.000|CC1|THEY WERE AMONG THE COAL MINERS 
20110103100750.000|20110103100752.000|CC1|WHO WERE TRAPPED UNDERGROUND.   
20110103100752.000|20110103100755.000|CC1|THE REMAINING 38 DID NOT MAKE   
20110103100755.000|20110103100755.000|CC1|IT.                             
20110103100755.000|20110103100800.000|CC1|MINING INDUSTRY IS STILL A BIG  
20110103100800.000|20110103100802.000|CC1|BUSINESS HERE.                  
20110103100802.000|20110103100805.000|CC1|FROM HERE, THE ENTIRE INDUSTRY  
20110103100805.000|20110103100806.000|CC1|HAS STARTED TO REVIEW ITS       
20110103100806.000|20110103100815.000|CC1|REGULATIONS TO GET THINGS RIGHT.
20110103100815.000|20110103100817.000|CC1|>> THIS IS THE RESCUE THAT      
20110103100817.000|20110103100825.000|CC1|CAPTURED THE HEART OF A NATION. 
20110103100825.000|20110103100828.000|CC1|SURVIVING EIGHT DAYS AND EIGHT  
20110103100828.000|20110103100831.000|CC1|NIGHTS DRINKING DIRTY WATER AND 
20110103100831.000|20110103100835.000|CC1|EATING COAL, MINERS HELD ON     
20110103100835.000|20110103100843.000|CC1|UNTIL RESCUERS FINALLY ARRIVED. 
20110103100843.000|20110103100851.000|CC1|SH FUNG LI WAS AMONG THE MOST --
20110103100851.000|20110103100853.000|CC1|THE FIRST GROUP OF THOSE        
20110103100853.000|20110103100853.000|CC1|RESCUED.                        
20110103100853.000|20110103100854.000|CC1|HE MEETS US IN HIS VILLAGE.     
20110103100854.000|20110103100856.000|CC1|HE TELLS US IT WAS THE THOUGHT  
20110103100856.000|20110103100857.000|CC1|OF HIS FAMILY THAT HELPED HIM   
20110103100857.000|20110103100917.000|CC1|GET THROUGH THE GRUELING ORDEAL.
20110103100917.000|20110103100922.000|CC1|>> HE IS A LOVING FATHER AND A  
20110103100922.000|20110103100922.000|CC1|DOWN-TO-EARTH PERSON.           
20110103100922.000|20110103100925.000|CC1|WE LEARNED THE DRAMA HAS TAKEN A
20110103100925.000|20110103100925.000|CC1|TOLL.                           
20110103100925.000|20110103100927.000|CC1|HE SAID NOW AND THEN HE HAS     
20110103100927.000|20110103100930.000|CC1|NIGHTMARES OF BEING TRAPPED IN  
20110103100930.000|20110103100931.000|CC1|THE CAVE.                       
20110103100931.000|20110103100934.000|CC1|IN THE DAYTIME, HE IS OFTEN     
20110103100934.000|20110103100935.000|CC1|DEPRESSED.                      
20110103100935.000|20110103100938.000|CC1|THE ACUTE INJURIES TO HIS BODY  
20110103100938.000|20110103100940.000|CC1|MIGHT BE GONE, BUT CHRONIC PAIN 
20110103100940.000|20110103100956.000|CC1|REMAINS.                        
20110103100956.000|20110103100959.000|CC1|>> 500 MILES AWAY THE WORST     
20110103100959.000|20110103101000.000|CC1|NIGHTMARE OF HIS LIFE REMAINS   
20110103101000.000|20110103101001.000|CC1|LARGELY SEALED OFF.             
20110103101001.000|20110103101003.000|CC1|A VENTILATION SYSTEM IS THE ONLY
20110103101003.000|20110103101004.000|CC1|ITEM UNDER CONSTRUCTION.        
20110103101004.000|20110103101006.000|CC1|WE'RE TOLD AFTER THE INCIDENT   
20110103101006.000|20110103101008.000|CC1|NINE PEOPLE, INCLUDING A PROJECT
20110103101008.000|20110103101010.000|CC1|MANAGER, AND A CHIEF ENGINEER,  
20110103101010.000|20110103101015.000|CC1|WERE ARRESTED FOR NEGLIGENCE OF 
20110103101015.000|20110103101017.000|CC1|DUTY.                           
20110103101017.000|20110103101019.000|CC1|PERHAPS THE BIGGEST LEGACY IS   
20110103101019.000|20110103101021.000|CC1|THAT IT FORCED THE FEDERAL      
20110103101021.000|20110103101023.000|CC1|GOVERNMENT TO PUT IN PLACE      
20110103101023.000|20110103101025.000|CC1|STRICTER REGULATIONS.           
20110103101025.000|20110103101027.000|CC1|FOR EXAMPLE, AN ACCOUNTABILITY  
20110103101027.000|20110103101027.000|CC1|SYSTEM HAS BEEN SET UP THAT SAYS
20110103101027.000|20110103101031.000|CC1|IF YOU ARE IN A MINE, YOU HAVE  
20110103101031.000|20110103101034.000|CC1|TO GO DOWN THE SHAFT WITH YOUR  
20110103101034.000|20110103101036.000|CC1|MINERS, OR YOU WILL BE SEVERELY 
20110103101036.000|20110103101039.000|CC1|PUNISHED.                       
20110103101039.000|20110103101040.000|CC1|THEY HAVE ORDERED ALL STAFF     
20110103101040.000|20110103101042.000|CC1|MEBBEDS TO REVIEW REGULATIONS   
20110103101042.000|20110103101043.000|CC1|OVER THE PAST MONTH.            
20110103101043.000|20110103101045.000|CC1|THE ONLY RECOURSE IS TO WAIT FOR
20110103101045.000|20110103101046.000|CC1|STATE APPROVAL FROM STATE       
20110103101046.000|20110103101050.000|CC1|AUTHORITIES TO REOPEN THE SITE. 
20110103101050.000|20110103101053.000|CC1|>> WE FIRED THOSE WHO WERE      
20110103101053.000|20110103101054.000|CC1|RESPONSIBLE FOR THE INCIDENT IN 
20110103101054.000|20110103101056.000|CC1|MARCH AND ORDERED EVERYBODY IN  
20110103101056.000|20110103101058.000|CC1|THE COUNTRY TO STUDY NEW SAFETY 
20110103101058.000|20110103101059.000|CC1|RULES.                          
20110103101059.000|20110103101101.000|CC1|WE ALSO TRIED TO IDENTIFY NEW   
20110103101101.000|20110103101102.000|CC1|SAFETY LOOPHOLES.               
20110103101102.000|20110103101105.000|CC1|WE DID A LOT OF SOUL-SEARCHING  
20110103101105.000|20110103101106.000|CC1|IN THE PAST FEW MONTHS.         
20110103101106.000|20110103101108.000|CC1|>> MANY BELIEVE A SOUL-SEARCHING
20110103101108.000|20110103101110.000|CC1|THROUGHOUT THE MINING INDUSTRY  
20110103101110.000|20110103101111.000|CC1|COULDN'T BE MORE TIMELY.        
20110103101111.000|20110103101114.000|CC1|IN SPITE OF RECENT SAFETY       
20110103101114.000|20110103101116.000|CC1|IMPROVEMENTS IN RECENT YEARS,   
20110103101116.000|20110103101119.000|CC1|CHINA'S COAL MINE STILL RANKED  
20110103101119.000|20110103101120.000|CC1|AMONG THE MOST DANGEROUS IN     
20110103101120.000|20110103101124.000|CC1|RECENT YEARS.                   
20110103101124.000|20110103101125.000|CC1|MOST MINERS HAVE BEEN WITHOUT   
20110103101125.000|20110103101128.000|CC1|JOBS, AND HE DOESN'T KNOW IF HE 
20110103101128.000|20110103101132.000|CC1|WILL EVER BE ABLE TO WORK AGAIN 
20110103101132.000|20110103101134.000|CC1|BECAUSE HIS INJURIES DO NOT     
20110103101134.000|20110103101137.000|CC1|ALLOW HIM TO PERFORM MANUAL     
20110103101137.000|20110103101137.000|CC1|LABOR.                          
20110103101137.000|20110103101138.000|CC1|HE SAID HE IS NOT SURE WHAT THE 
20110103101138.000|20110103101140.000|CC1|REST OF HIS LIFE HOLDS IN STORE.
20110103101140.000|20110103101142.000|CC1|THERE IS ONE THING HE IS SURE   
20110103101142.000|20110103101147.000|CC1|OF, THAT IS, THAT HE WILL NEVER 
20110103101147.000|20110103101149.000|CC1|SET FOOT IN ANOTHER COAL MINE.  
20110103101149.000|20110103101152.000|CC1|>> ON THAT TOPIC, WE ARE JOINED 
20110103101152.000|20110103101155.000|CC1|BY MY COLLEAGUE.                
20110103101155.000|20110103101156.000|CC1|150 MEN WERE SAVED.             
20110103101156.000|20110103101158.000|CC1|WHAT IS BEHIND THE RESCUE OF THE
20110103101158.000|20110103101159.000|CC1|OPERATION?                      
20110103101159.000|20110103101201.000|CC1|>> FIRST OF ALL, WE ARE ALL VERY
20110103101201.000|20110103101203.000|CC1|IMPRESSED OF THE PERSEVERENCE OF
20110103101203.000|20110103101204.000|CC1|THE MINERS.                     
20110103101204.000|20110103101206.000|CC1|WE KNOW FOR EIGHT DAYS AND EIGHT
20110103101206.000|20110103101208.000|CC1|NIGHTS THEY WENT THROUGH HELL.  
20110103101208.000|20110103101211.000|CC1|FIRST OF ALL, TO SURVIVE, THEY  
20110103101211.000|20110103101213.000|CC1|STRAPPED THEMSELVES TO THE WALL 
20110103101213.000|20110103101216.000|CC1|OF THE SHAFT SO THEY WOULDN'T   
20110103101216.000|20110103101218.000|CC1|DROWN WHILE SLEEPING.           
20110103101218.000|20110103101221.000|CC1|TO SURVIVE THEY ATE TREE BARK

20110103103537.000|20110103103538.000|CC1|RECOGNIZE THAT WHEN THEY HEAD TO
20110103103538.000|20110103103540.000|CC1|THE STORES AND THE MALLS IN     
20110103103540.000|20110103103541.000|CC1|AMERICA, THEY ARE ABLE TO WALK  
20110103103541.000|20110103103542.000|CC1|IN AND BUY A LOT OF GOODS THAT  
20110103103542.000|20110103103544.000|CC1|ARE CHEAPER HERE BECAUSE THEY   
20110103103544.000|20110103103546.000|CC1|ARE MADE IN THE DAK FACTORIES IN
20110103103546.000|20110103103547.000|CC1|CHINA.                          
20110103103547.000|20110103103550.000|CC1|LOWER WAGES FOR WORKERS.        
20110103103550.000|20110103103552.000|CC1|IT COSTS LESS TO BUY THEM.      
20110103103552.000|20110103103554.000|CC1|THEY ARE ABLE TO BUY THEM FOR A 
20110103103554.000|20110103103555.000|CC1|CHEAPER PRICE.                  
20110103103555.000|20110103103556.000|CC1|ON THE OTHER HAND, THAT SETS UP 
20110103103556.000|20110103103558.000|CC1|COMPETITION FOR JOBS IN THOSE

20110103103559.000|20110103103600.000|CC1|OVER IN CHINA, AND SOME OF THEM 
20110103103600.000|20110103103603.000|CC1|HAVE LEFT THIS COUNTRY FOR      
20110103103603.000|20110103103603.000|CC1|CHINA.
